channel.title: MTA-Scape 317! 2 worlds pvp and eco
channel.description:
The server you'll never forget!
MTASCAPE Pvp-Eco can offer you a great gameplay experience which will also be a fantastic adventure for you!
From killing Other people and getting there loot!
We offer you: All god wars bosses! Tormented demons! Corporeal beast! A perfected Nex! Queen and King black dragons! Fight cave with 63 waves! Fight kiln! Great and stable economy! No downtime! No lagg! Server uptime at 100%! Freaquent updates! Money pouch! Medium xp, achieving a 99 has never felt so good! No random messages! High quality, fullscreen! RuneSpan! Stealing creation! Pest control! + ALOT MORE ! Forum:http://mtaforums.com/forum.php ECO Webclient: http://mtaforums.com/mtaeco.php PvP Webclient:http://mtaforums.com/mtapvp.php Download:https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/hzfd3tpweyfbohs/MTAScapeECO.jar
